modName: Balin The Brave a Familiar Faces Follower Preset and Modded Save
summary:
Balin The Brave! A True Dwemer Hero!
Well, actually he's a Nord-Dwemer-Enthusiast-Warrior, but it sounds cool, right? This is sort of a collection of my latest and greatest Dragonborn, Balin the Brave! (In case you're wondering, You do have to shout his name every time you say it.)
descriptionHtml:
Description:
Balin The Brave! A True Dwemer Hero! 
Well, actually he's a Nord-Dwemer-Enthusiast-Warrior, but it sounds cool, right? This is sort of a collection of my latest and greatest Dragonborn, Balin the Brave! (In case you're wondering, You do have to shout his name every time you say it.) Also, don't forget to bring his [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61412/?]Wife and Best Friend[/url] with him.

Requirements:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54509/?]Familiar Faces[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]Racemenu 3[/url] and (optional) [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20721/?]Advanced Skyrim Overhaul[/url](Needed for his Armour, but can be replaced by vanilla Dwemer Armour.)

Stats:
Sex: Male
Race: Nord
Level: 81
Combat Style: Warrior (One-handed)
Marriable?:Yes
Follower?:Yes
Defeated Alduin?:Yes
Can I make him an Enemy?:Yes.

Credits:
Bethesda for Skyrim and the rest of the Elder Scrolls series
[b][b]gulogulo for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20721/?]Advanced Skyrim Overhaul[/url][/b][/b]
[b]Verteiron for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54509/?]Familiar Faces[/url]
[/b][b]Expired for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]Racemenu 3[/url][/b]
author: KingLupusMortem
